analysis.description:
OOOOOO.Defaultaddress (/unique_chucks/48/0x0c736b3c9170ae42e2dedba814f5e4530895c840.sol#38-39) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- burn (/unique_chucks/48/0x0c736b3c9170ae42e2dedba814f5e4530895c840.sol#113-128)

Ldohtoken.burn (/unique_chucks/48/0x0c736b3c9170ae42e2dedba814f5e4530895c840.sol#113-128) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(Defaultaddress,_value) (/unique_chucks/48/0x0c736b3c9170ae42e2dedba814f5e4530895c840.sol#127)
Parameter 'NewAddress' of OOOOOO.UpdateContractaddress (/unique_chucks/48/0x0c736b3c9170ae42e2dedba814f5e4530895c840.sol#50) is not in mixedCase
